price: In that case, We would have made you taste double punishment, both in this life and after death. Thereupon you would have found no helper against Us.
arabic: إِذٗا لَّأَذَقۡنَٰكَ ضِعۡفَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ وَضِعۡفَ ٱلۡمَمَاتِ ثُمَّ لَا تَجِدُ لَكَ عَلَيۡنَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: idhan la-adhaqnāka ḍiʿ'fa al-ḥayati waḍiʿ'fa al-mamāti thumma lā tajidu laka ʿalaynā naṣīran
